about_the_game:
ShotSurged is a 6v6 arcade shooter that aims to give you that classic shooter feel.

WEAPONS AND LOADOUTS

ShotSurged includes 20+ guns, all of which you can unlock via leveling up. And on top of that ShotSurged includes a loadout system, allowing you to customize 5 loadouts and name them to your liking!

PROGRESSION

ShotSurged brings various ways for you to earn rewards for entirely free!

You can earn rewards from leveling up and playing the game!

Dedicating yourself to grinding out your levels will reward you greatly, you'll earn items ranging from operator skins, camos, calling cards, emblems, and more.

THE COMMUNITY

ShotSurged brings you a way to engage with the community and your friends with clans, clans give you a way to rep your team with your friends or new people.

MOVEMENT

ShotSurged has a lot of movement features, but the key highlight is vaulting and proning, whether your setting up to get ready and pick off your enemies with a sniper at a distance or your vaulting your way out of gunfire there is a feature for every type of player in ShotSurged.

GREAT GRAPHICS

ShotSurged also aims to make maps look great and beautiful, so when all is quiet you can take in the maps glory.

content_descriptors.notes: ShotSurged includes depictions of violence and war, certain characters ingame may use inappropriate language.

ext_user_account_notice: ShotSurged Account (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: ShotSurged

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: An internet connection is required to play shotsurged.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: An internet connection is required to play shotsurged.

short_description: ShotSurged is a 6v6 arcade shooter that aims to give you that classic shooter feel.
